aes256.title: AES-256 encryption at rest
aes256.text: Industry-standard encryption for all stored data. Your sensitive information is encrypted using AES-256, the same encryption used by banks and governments worldwide.

tls13.title: TLS 1.3 for data in transit
tls13.text: All data transmitted between your browser and our servers uses TLS 1.3, the latest and most secure version of transport layer security.

e2eApi.title: End-to-end encrypted API calls
e2eApi.text: Every API request and response is encrypted end-to-end. Even if intercepted, the data remains unreadable to attackers.

keyManagement.title: Secure key management
keyManagement.text: Encryption keys are managed through Vercel's secure environment variables system with automatic rotation and access controls.

vercel.title: Hosted on Vercel
vercel.text: SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certified infrastructure. Enterprise-grade security with automatic SSL and DDoS protection.

supabase.title: Database on Supabase
supabase.text: SOC 2 compliant and GDPR ready PostgreSQL database with built-in security features.

ddos.title: DDoS protection
ddos.text: Enterprise-level DDoS mitigation via Cloudflare handling 100+ million requests per second.

multiRegion.title: Multi-region redundancy
multiRegion.text: Data replicated across multiple geographic regions for high availability and disaster recovery.

noCustom.title: No custom smart contracts
noCustom.text: We use standard, battle-tested USDC token contracts. No custom code means no custom vulnerabilities.

clientSide.title: Client-side transaction signing
clientSide.text: All transactions are signed in your browser using your wallet. Your private keys never leave your device.

nonCustodial.title: Non-custodial architecture
nonCustodial.text: Funds go directly from customer wallet to merchant wallet. StablePay never has access to move, freeze, or hold your money.

verification.title: Blockchain verification
verification.text: Every payment is publicly verifiable on the blockchain. Full transparency and immutable audit trail.

roadmap.title: Security Roadmap 2025-2026
roadmap.intro: Built in NYC, securing payments globally. Our ongoing security initiatives:

minimization.title: Data minimization
minimization.text: We only collect data that's essential for payment processing. No unnecessary tracking or profiling.

access.title: Right to access your data
access.text: Request a full export of all your data at any time through your dashboard or by contacting support.

delete.title: Right to delete your data
delete.text: Request complete deletion of your account and associated data. We retain only legally required transaction records.

euResidency.title: EU data residency
euResidency.text: Available on enterprise plans. Store your data exclusively in EU data centers for full GDPR compliance.

orderDetails.title: Order details
orderDetails.text: Essential transaction information for payment processing:

txHashes.title: Transaction hashes
txHashes.text: Public blockchain transaction IDs. This data is already public on the blockchain and allows payment verification.

merchantInfo.title: Merchant account info
merchantInfo.text: Email, company name, and wallet addresses for merchants accepting payments.

neverCollect.title: We NEVER collect sensitive data
neverCollect.text: Your security is paramount. We never collect:

transactions.title: Transaction data (7 years)
transactions.text: Required by financial regulations for audit and compliance purposes. Includes payment amounts, timestamps, and transaction IDs.

orderHistory.title: Order history (indefinite)
orderHistory.text: Merchants have permanent access to their order history for business records and customer support.

serverLogs.title: Server logs (90 days)
serverLogs.text: Technical logs for debugging and security monitoring. Automatically deleted after 90 days.

accountData.title: Account data (until deleted)
accountData.text: Your account information is retained until you request deletion. You can export or delete your data anytime.

step1.title: 1. Customer initiates payment
step1.text: Customer clicks 'Pay with Crypto' on merchant's checkout page. StablePay payment modal opens with order details and supported networks.

step2.title: 2. Wallet connection
step2.text: Customer connects their Web3 wallet to confirm payment:
step2.item1: MetaMask for EVM chains (Ethereum, Polygon, Base, Arbitrum)

step3.title: 3. Direct blockchain transfer
step3.text: USDC is sent directly from customer wallet to merchant wallet on-chain. Key security features:

step4.title: 4. Transaction confirmed
step4.text: Payment is verified on blockchain and merchant is notified:

nonCustodial.title: Non-custodial architecture explained
nonCustodial.text: StablePay NEVER holds your funds. Here's why this matters:
nonCustodial.item1: No risk of StablePay being hacked for your funds
nonCustodial.item3: Payments arrive instantly in your wallet
nonCustodial.item4: You maintain full control at all times
nonCustodial.item5: We only provide the payment interface

ethereum.title: Ethereum (L1 + L2)
ethereum.text: Most secure and battle-tested blockchain. Support for mainnet and testnets:

baseOptimism.title: Base & Optimism (L2)
baseOptimism.text: Low-cost Optimistic Rollups with Ethereum security:

spl.title: SPL tokens on Solana
spl.text: Solana Program Library standard. Currently supporting USDC with more tokens coming soon.

securityFirst.title: Security-first approach
securityFirst.item2: Only tokens by Circle and Tether

onchain.title: On-chain verification
onchain.text: Every payment is verified directly on the blockchain. No off-chain trust required - math and cryptography guarantee payment authenticity.

realtime.title: Real-time monitoring
realtime.text: We monitor blockchain nodes 24/7 to detect and confirm transactions instantly. Webhooks fire within seconds of confirmation.

publicTransparency.title: Public transparency
publicTransparency.text: All transaction hashes are publicly visible:

rbac.title: Role-based access control
rbac.text: Granular permissions system. Team members only access what they need - developers can't access production databases, support can't modify code.

mfa.title: Multi-factor authentication
mfa.text: MFA required for all team accounts. Hardware security keys (YubiKey) required for admin access. No exceptions.

apiRotation.title: API key rotation
apiRotation.text: All API keys and secrets automatically rotated every 90 days. Zero-downtime rotation with overlapping validity periods.

leastPrivilege.title: Least privilege principle
leastPrivilege.text: Every user and service has minimum permissions needed. Regular access reviews to remove unused permissions.

system24x7.title: 24/7 system monitoring
system24x7.text: Round-the-clock infrastructure monitoring across all systems:

alerts.title: Real-time alerts
alerts.text: Instant notifications for errors, slowdowns, or anomalies. On-call engineers paged immediately for critical issues.

auditLogs.title: Comprehensive audit logs
auditLogs.text: Every action logged with timestamp, user, IP address, and context. 90-day retention for compliance and debugging.

anomalyDetection.title: Anomaly detection
anomalyDetection.text: Machine learning models detect unusual patterns - sudden traffic spikes, unusual API usage, or potential attacks.

responsePlan.title: Documented response plan
responsePlan.text: Detailed playbooks for every scenario - data breaches, DDoS attacks, infrastructure failures. Regularly tested and updated.

criticalResponse.title: 24-hour critical response
criticalResponse.text: Critical security issues addressed within 24 hours. On-call rotation ensures always-available response team in NYC timezone.

postAnalysis.title: Post-incident analysis
postAnalysis.text: Thorough root cause analysis after every incident. Public postmortems for issues affecting merchants. Preventive measures implemented.

notifications.title: Customer notifications
notifications.text: Transparent communication during incidents. Email, dashboard alerts, and status page updates keep merchants informed.

instantSettlement.title: Instant settlement
instantSettlement.text: No chargebacks, ever. Crypto payments are final once confirmed:
instantSettlement.item1: Funds arrive in seconds, not days

blockchainVerify.title: Blockchain verification
blockchainVerify.text: Every transaction is mathematically verified on-chain. No fake payments, no double-spends, no fraud.

noReversals.title: No payment reversals
noReversals.text: Crypto's biggest advantage - payments can't be reversed by banks or payment processors. You're in control.

fraudDetection.title: Automatic fraud detection
fraudDetection.text: Machine learning monitors transaction patterns. Suspicious activity flagged instantly for merchant review.

uptime.title: 99.9% uptime SLA
uptime.text: Less than 9 hours of downtime per year. Financial penalties if we miss SLA targets. Your payments stay online.

multiRegion.title: Multi-region infrastructure
multiRegion.text: Deployed across multiple data centers worldwide. If one region fails, traffic automatically routes to healthy regions.

failover.title: Automated failover
failover.text: Health checks every 10 seconds. Automatic failover to backup systems in under 30 seconds. Zero manual intervention.

statusPage.title: Real-time status page
statusPage.text: Live system status at status.stablepay.io. Subscribe for incident notifications and maintenance windows.

builtIn.title: Built-in refund system
builtIn.text: Issue refunds directly from your dashboard. Connect your wallet once, refund with one click. Full history and tracking.

batch.title: Batch refund support
batch.text: Process multiple refunds in one transaction using Multicall3:
batch.item2: Refund hundreds of customers at once

auditTrail.title: Full audit trail
auditTrail.text: Every refund logged with reason, amount, timestamp, and transaction hash. Export for accounting and compliance.

policies.title: Merchant-controlled policies
policies.text: You set refund policies. Full refunds, partial refunds, or no refunds - your business, your rules.

github.title: Client-side SDK on GitHub
github.text: Full source code available for inspection:

apiDocs.title: Public API documentation
apiDocs.text: Complete API docs with code examples in multiple languages. Try all endpoints in interactive playground before integrating.

noHiddenFees.title: No hidden fees
noHiddenFees.text: One simple price: 0.5% per transaction. No setup fees, no monthly fees, no surprise charges. What you see is what you pay.

responsible.title: Responsible disclosure program
responsible.text: Found a security issue? Report it privately to security@stablepay.io. We'll acknowledge within 24 hours and keep you updated throughout the fix process.

bugBounty.title: Bug bounty program
bugBounty.text: Launching Q4 2025. Rewards up to $10,000 for critical vulnerabilities. Help us build the most secure crypto payment platform.

advisories.title: Public security advisories
advisories.text: All security issues published on GitHub after fix deployment. Full timeline, impact assessment, and remediation steps disclosed.

updates.title: Regular security updates
updates.text: Monthly security newsletter with platform updates, dependency patches, and industry security news. Subscribe in your dashboard.

report.title: Report Security Issues
report.intro: If you discover a security vulnerability, please email us at:
report.details: Include: detailed description, steps to reproduce, potential impact, and your contact info. We respond within 24 hours.

cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of merchants accepting crypto payments with StablePay

brand.missionText: Crypto payments made simple, secure, and self-custodial. Built by developers, for developers.
